name: The Billion Dollar Minute
description:
This game was created for the Trijam in 2.54 hours.

This was the first time I made a game for a Game Jam and it was intense. I really liked the experience and I will definitely participate in another one.

I'm sorry for my bad English, but I'm learning it at the moment and trying to get better.

And now about the story: You are a member of the famous gang "The Cursed". After 10 hard years you want to have one last big raid and then retire. It's up to you whether you can do this or die trying.

The Game was made with the Godot Engine. The credits for the game can be found in a separate .txt file in the download area.
